dict.acceptation: 相隔，相距；分散地，分开地；成部分，成碎片；分辨；

sent.orig: These towns are many miles apart; stood with his legs apart; born two years apart.
sent.trans: 这几个市镇相距有很多英里；两腿叉开站着；出生时间相距两年。

sent.orig: Cell towers can be many blocks apart -- or miles apart in a rural area.
sent.trans: 在偏远地区，移动通讯基站间相隔许多街区，甚至数英里。

sent.orig: There are no duties apart from rights, or rights apart from duties.
sent.trans: 没有离开权利的义务，也没有离开义务的权利。

sent.orig: With the analytical method, the clearance of mesh-apart and response of mesh-apart vibration can be calculated.
sent.trans: 运用解析的方法可以求得脱啮间隙以及脱啮冲击响应。

sent.orig: Extreme worlds alone, then it fell apart, fell apart!
sent.trans: 极端的世界独自地，然后它分别地落下，分别地落下！
